title: E-Mail Login t-online
content:
Problems with t-online e-mail account

A friend of mine has problems with Firefox (82.0.3) with his e-mail login at t-online. He accesses his e-mail account via the start page "www.t-online.de", the login mask with the saved user name appears, then "NEXT" and then the error message: "Login not possible", no password is asked. In Firefox, the correct user name and password are entered under "Access data and passwords", We accessed the email account via "Edge", same login data, that worked. How can I fix the login procedure in "Firefox"?

Thanks in advance W. Drewes
creator: wdrewes

title: Extra white space after unicode apostrophe
content:
Noticed recently weird spaces in random-ish places on some websites.

Generally ignored it but recently noticed it on hacker news, and decided to investigate.

Made test case: https://depesz.com/ff-bug.html

In chrome it displays OK, but in Firefox, there is extra white space after apostrophe.

When I looked into it, it looks that it's not normal, ascii, apostrophe, but unicode character "RIGHT SINGLE QUOTATION MARK" (U+2019).

Any idea on what could be wrong?

I'm using FF 82.0.2, from Ubuntu, on Ubuntu 20.04.1 LTS.

title: Firefox 82.0.3 update: All my Bookmarks and Tabs gone
content: All my Bookmarks and Tabs have vanished after the Firefox 82.0.3 update yesterday. Related? Searching for hours, including Firefox site and cannot find solution. I noticed 'Restore Previous Session' was recommended as a 'fix' at some links. Mine is grayed out...if that matters. I have VERY important bookmarks, including links related to Hurricane Sally destruction to my home. PLEASE HELP! I'm not very computer savvy, so 'instructions for dummies' would be helpful. PS...I was able to bookmark this page, but at least 100 bookmarks vanished. Tabs & Bookmarks are fine with Safari and Chrome. Unfortunately, I rarely used those and did not migrate most Bookmarks to them. Lesson learned. Thanks in advance John

title: Help for help
content:
A number of functions have gotten a lot worse with the update. One of them is the help function. A lot of the help sites describes the old Firefox version, and if I choose the most updated version, the help files still describes the old version.

And a remark: And its very annoying that we cant reach the company for issues like these. Instead they hide behind these forums, handled by other users who have to take all the heat from us disappointed users. Thats not user friendly. And how well protected are we when the company dont want to have a dialogue with us users?

title: Firefox 82.02 some buttons and hypertext don't work
content:
Please advise,

I click on hypertext and/or a button. It fails. No response. No error message. It's as though I never clicked it. It's an intermittent problem that arises on many sites. The worst thing is it usually fails on an activation like making a payment, logging in, or joining a site. You know, right when you most need the button to work. Then I have to switch to Edge.

I suspect it has something to do with Java or Javascript not being functional with Firefox. However, the news of the workaround hasn't reached me. I've had Edge as my backup when this failure occurs. If Java is such a security threat, it doesn't make sense to have me switch to a browser that handles Java.
creator: free3ist

title: fishing planet online.
content:
Firstly,i am an emergency worker,i must regularly drop my mouse and run when the alarm rings. If i do this when playing Fishing Planet my game freezes if i am gone too long then i must use task manager to restart my pc.I know this is not your prob but it is the Devs of FP that are doing that because they dont like it if you leave your avatar hanging in game with no movement.Well i apologise to no one about having to do that because i am away busy dealing with peoples lives. 

  Now that all just describes FP tactics but where it concerns you is that FP is also refusing to allow me to pause the Sim and go to other web sites which i also need to do regularly. So basically if i pause FP and then browse to another site it keeps crashing my FF Browser as if they are trying not to allow me to do that while their sim is open. Well as i said i work strictly to an emergency alarm and FP has no right to crash my browser. Of course they will deny it but i assure you my assumptions are correct and they need to sync better with you. Thanks in advance,im sure there are other E staff all over the world getting punished by FP for leaving their Sim paused and it needs to be sorted out between them and you.
creator: mervward111111

title: Janela flutuante
content:
Ultimamente tenho utilizado muito o meet como ambiente de reunião nesse período de pandemia. Infelizmente abre essa janela flutuante que fica exatamente em cima das abas quando o meet usa a minha câmera, o meu microfone e quando compartilho a tela como na imagem em anexo. Isso atrapalha muito a navegação quando abro mais de uma aba, inclusive mesmo após minimizar o navegador essa janela permanece na tela sobrepondo outros aplicativos e isso tem me incomodado bastante. Há alguma forma de retirar essa janela ou desabilitar? seria de grande ajuda pois essa janela está sendo o único ponto negativo no firefox para mim pois particularmente é o meu navegador favorito.

title: Windows Computer Doesn't Sync With Other Devices
content:
I have a computer running Windows 10, a recent iPhone, and a virtual machine running Arch Linux, all with the latest version of their Firefox installed and on the latest version of their OS, all logged into my Firefox account for Sync.

It looks like only my iOS and Linux instances of Firefox are syncing bookmarks and open tabs with each other, but my Windows machine just isn't sending or receiving Sync data. Sending pages directly to a device works, and so does syncing Firefox Extensions. Bookmarks and currently open tabs, however, do not sync between Windows and the other two instances. Everything did sync at one point about a week ago, but no bookmarks or tabs have been received from my Windows instance since.

So far I have attempted uninstalling/reinstalling Firefox on my phone, as well as logging out on all devices and logging back in starting with the desktop, but the issue is still there. Notifications are enabled on my phone and I haven't changed Sync settings on Desktop, so everything should be syncing. Thanks for any help.
creator: berg.gibson
